item.title: Creative Youtube video editor and producer - Upwork
item.description:
Budget is for 5 to 15mins videos. Videos will be produced for a new Youtube channel on a regular and continuous basis that ranges from 3mins to 15 mins duration on the average. The topic is soccer so knowledge of African football is desirable especially Nigerian football. A sample of the types of effects expected include those in a Youtube channel by "Jude Bela" in Nigeria. Please provide samples of your work in your bid. Copyright policies on the You tube platform is also required. Thanks

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 24, 2024 05:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: United States

item.title: Create Short Commercial for Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create a short commercial for Instagram. The commercial will be based on raw outdoor videos showcasing a new waterfowl hunting product. The goal is to capture the attention of the target audience and generate interest in the product. The final video should be engaging, visually appealing, and have a professional look.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creative thinking
- Attention to detail

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 24, 2024 04:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Content Writing
Skills: Video Commercial, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Content Writing

item.title: Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are searching for a driven, detail-oriented content creator NOT A SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER to produce high-quality outputs for Vanda Salon. The content creator will update existing material, generate novel ( new / interesting) work.  To be a successful content creator, you should focus on appealing to consumers' interests by creating engaging material. Ultimately, an exceptional content creator will promote collaboration between internal stakeholders to ensure consistency in Vanda Salon's outputs. Content Creator Responsibilities:
1. Writing, reviewing, editing, and updating content for IG, FB, Tik Tok, Pinterest, blogs, and Linked In.
2. Assisting Vanda Salon with the design of promotional content
Content Creator Requirements:
1. Experience creating strong, engaging content.
2. A portfolio of applicable outputs.
3. An understanding of SEO best practices.
4. Demonstrated excellence in writing, proofreading, and editing.
5. Excellent research, organizational, and time management skills.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 04:39 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Content Creation, Social Media Content Creation, Organic Traffic Growth, Instagram Reels, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Content, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Content Creation, Social Media Content Creation, Organic Traffic Growth, Instagram Reels, Content Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Producer for Personal Transformation and Growth Podcast - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented podcast manager to join our team and help create a new podcast focused on personal transformation and growth for high-achievers. As the podcast producer, you will be responsible for managing the entire production process from start to finish, including researching and booking guests, conducting interviews, editing audio and video, and producing the final episodes, creating reels and marketing via social media. This role requires strong organizational and communication skills, as well as experience in podcast production and a deep understanding of the personal development industry. If you are passionate about helping high-achievers reach their full potential and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you.

Skills:
- Podcast production
- Audio editing
- Video editing
- Guest booking
- Interviewing
- Storytelling

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 24, 2024 04:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Podcast, Podcast Production, Audio Production, Audio Post Production, Audiobook
Skills: Podcast, Podcast Production, Audio Production, Audio Post Production, Audiobook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional YouTube or Facebook Ad Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled professional to create a captivating 30 to 60 seconds advertisement for our business. The ad will be used on YouTube and Facebook platforms to promote our products/services. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, motion graphics, and storytelling techniques. The ad should be visually appealing, engaging, and able to effectively communicate our brand message. We will provide the necessary content (images, videos, and text) and expect the freelancer to bring creativity and expertise to elevate the ad's quality. If you have the skills and vision to create a high-quality advertisement that drives conversions, please message us with your portfolio and past work samples. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 04:29 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Skills: Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Style Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented TikTok style video editor to create high engagement ads. The ideal candidate should have a creative mindset and be able to deliver quick turnarounds. The videos should be visually appealing and captivating, with attention-grabbing effects and transitions. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the videos align with our brand image. The editor should be familiar with TikTok trends and styles, and able to incorporate them into our content. If you have a passion for creating viral videos and can create visually stunning content, we want to hear from you!

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Creative thinking
- Strong attention to detail
- Familiarity with TikTok trends
- Quick turnaround

Experience Level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 04:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply
